column4: Hi, is there a notepad++ alternative for ubuntu/linux? (Im aware of a range of ide's liek netbeans and codeblocks etc - but a multi-language one ( specifically php, C++) ?
they provide the source for notepad ++, why don't you try to compile it? or port it over to ubuntu
gedit is ok, im using it for the time beign.
there really is only minor differences between the two
